column5: What a great way to end the games. Neil Young was perfectly fitting
Good call, I love that guy!  I mean his music  Paul  Rust never sleeps
he was great and his song was perfect
I agree. "Long may you run" was perfect.
Great show till those amatuers KOS started jumping around.  Can Nickleback rock or what.
Closing ceremonies was head and shoulders better than opening ceremonies (in my opinion).  Great ending
